patterns: what is BGS Institute of Technology
responses: BGS Institute of Technology (BGSIT) is an engineering college established in 2005. It is located at Bellur Cross, Karnataka, and is affiliated with VTU and approved by AICTE. The college is managed by Sri Adichunchanagiri Shikshana Trust.

patterns: what is the location of the college
responses: BGSIT is located at Bellur Cross, BG Nagar, Karnataka, along NH-75. Our complete address is: BG Nagar, Nagamangala Taluk, Mandya District, Karnataka - 571448
